title: Daydreamer-RELOADED

nERv

Daydreamer (c) Roland Studios

08/2015: RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION: Steam
1: DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE: Action, Indie

Daydreamer is a platformer based in a beautifully-illustrated
Post-Apocalyptic World from the mind of artist Roland Womack. As the last
human survivor, you are on a quest to rescue the Immortal Gatekeeper, the
last hope for a dying world. The game focuses on high-intensity Boss
Battles in a classic 90s Arcade fashion with a modern twist that
incorporates support characters to aid you in battle. Fight your way
through 14 unique bosses across a set of imaginative dreamscapes, employing
a number of weapons and abilities to overcome your foes and the
environment

1. Unrar
2. Burn or mount the image
3. Install the game
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory
5. Play the game
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
